entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
